criticism: Integer overflow in PayWinner and AddTicket functions allows attackers to set 'winnerPrice' and 'totalBounty' to any value, causing a potential loss of assets.
Predictable random value in PayWinner function allows an attacker to always win, causing a potential security issue.
Access control issue in Withdraw function allows an attacker to withdraw all assets, causing a potential security issue.
Typo in LottoCount constructor allows attackers to change contract ownership, causing a potential security issue.
